insert into front_member (user_id, company_id, company_name, reg_dt, depart_ids, role_ids, positions, user_valid, login_dt, depart_ids_bak, depart_names, role_ids_bak, role_names) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{departIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{departIdsBak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleIdsBak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update front_member set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_dt = #{regDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, depart_ids = #{departIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_ids = #{roleIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, positions = #{positions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_valid = #{userValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, login_dt = #{loginDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, depart_ids_bak = #{departIdsBak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, depart_names = #{departNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_ids_bak = #{roleIdsBak,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_names = #{roleNames,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
